{"id":1282367314,"question_id":3442,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1717904629,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"891 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1282367314/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Total Reward Using Operations I","memory":"16.8 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def maxTotalReward(self, rv: List[int]) -> int:\n        rv.sort()\n        dp = {}\n        N = len(rv)\n        dp[0] = 1\n        for i in range(N):\n            for j in range(rv[i]-1, -1, -1):\n                if j in dp:\n                    dp[rv[i] + j] = 1\n        \n        res = 0\n        for key in dp:\n            res = max(res, key)\n        \n        return res","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-total-reward-using-operations-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
